Class LineShape

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Shape
        |
        +--EdgedShape
              |
              +--LineShape
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, DrawableElement
public class LineShape
extends EdgedShape
implements java.lang.Cloneable

The LineShape class represents a line in 2D space specified with integer coordinates. It also contains an edge color specified with a Color object.

See Also:
Line2D.Double, Color

Fields inherited from class Shape
HANDLE_SIZE

writeToStream

public void writeToStream(java.io.PrintWriter stream)
Writes this object's state to a PrintWriter stream. The state is written in the following manner (without any of the comments or the "----"): ---- LineShape // the class name // the first x coordinate // the first y coordinate // the second x coordinate // the second y coordinate // the red component of the edge color // the green component of the edge color* // the blue component of the edge color* ---- if the edge or fill color is null, the red component is replaced with "-1" and the green and blue components are not written out.
Overrides:
writeToStream in class Shape
Parameters:
stream - the PrintWriter stream to write the state to
